· Burn higher grade coals in power plants.

· Reduce coal burning by producing more electricity by a renewable energy source (solar, wind, etc.).

· Reduce coal burning by producing more electricity by using nuclear energy or natural gas.

· Install more scrubbers, electrostatic precipitators, and/or baghouse filters on coal burning power plants.

· Increase the use of electric vehicles.

· Reduce road traffic (tailpipe emissions and/or road dust) by increasing carpooling, public transportation, and electric vehicle use.
